message:
Title: "Hidden Victories Amidst International Tensions"

Homes built on global ties,
Office squabbles wear thin,
Much at stake lies,
Engaging diplomacy’s firm chin.

Refugees' fate; we meditate.
Office notions usurp blame.
Foreign faction won’t abate,
Fraternizing our nations' claim,
Instead, we cultivate unity, 
Cease the strain, embrace the grand opportunity,
Ever hopeful for austerity's immunity.
prompt: Row brews between Home Office and Foreign Office on eve of UN refugee summit Tensions between the Home Office and Foreign Office are said to be “strained” before the largest international gathering in years on the refugee crisis, with the UK’s contribution overshadowed by the row over Rwanda. Headed by development minister Andrew Mitchell, the UK delegation at this week’s UN Global Refugee Forum will unveil what it describes as an “ambitious package” that includes
